_header: To the black draw the knife

BLHar3362.Transcription: To þe blak draw þy knyfWith þe brown led þy lyf
BLHar3362.Note: Written two lines of verse to one line of MS.
BLHar3362.Editions:
Smith,  William George. 
             The Oxford Dictionary of English Proverbs.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; rev. ed. 1948: 536.
